comments.en: Cartridge containing toner and imaging drum

Cheap, compact desktop laser printer, foldable tray for 150 sheets, A4/Letter/Legal, up to 14 pages/min. Somewhat faster than the LaserJet 1010, "Fastres 1200" resolution enhancement.

Seems not to understand any standard language. There is no report about this printer working on a GNU/Linux or Unix system and HP classifies it as "host-based".

Rick Richardson (rickr at mn dot rr dot com), author of the "foo2zjs" driver (driver for the HP LaserJet 1000/1005), has examined the output of the Windows driver for this printer and found out that the language looks like PCL + PCL 6/XL (see report on the HP forum on linuxprinting.org). Probably the printer understands a stripped-down PCL 6 without text capabilities. So it would be interesting to try this printer with the "lj5gray"/"lj5mono" drivers (NOT the "pxlmono" driver, because "pxlmono" is a vector driver which sends text as text).
